title-part.text: ELECTROLYTIC OR ELECTROPHORETIC PROCESSES FOR THE PRODUCTION OF COMPOUNDS OR NON-METALS

reference.text: anodic or cathodic protection C23F13/00; single-crystal growth C30B

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, in the absence of an indication to the contrary, classification is made in the last appropriate place.
Compounds of particular interest are also classified in the relevant classes, e.g. C01, C07.

The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC system. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
C25B11/06 covered by B01J, C25B11/0442
C25B11/08 covered by B01J, C25B11/0442
C25B11/10 covered by C25B11/0442

title-part.text: Electrolytic production of inorganic compounds or non-metals

CPC-specific-text.text: by photo-electrolysis with or without external current source

title-part.text: in cells with flat or platelike electrodes
of alkaline earth metal compounds or magnesium compounds
Simultaneous production of alkali metal hydroxides and chlorine, its oxyacids or salts
Electrogenerative processes, i.e. processes for producing compounds in which simultaneously electricity is generated
Electrophorectic production of compounds or non-metals

reference.text: separation or purification of peptides, e.g. of proteins, by electrophoresis C07K1/26

title-part.text: Assemblies of constructional parts, e.g. electrode-diaphragm assemblies

CPC-specific-text.text: Electric inter-cell connections including jumper switches

title-part.text: including an ion-exchange membrane in or on which electrode material is embedded
Cells or assemblies of cells comprising at least one movable electrode, e.g. rotary electrodes

CPC-specific-text.text: Grouping of such cells into batteries
Grouping of such cells into batteries

title-part.text: Cells or assemblies of cells comprising at least one electrode made of particles

CPC-specific-text.text: Grouping of such cells into batteries
Grouping of such cells into batteries

title-part.text: Assemblies comprising a plurality of cells

reference.text: ; assemblies of cells with movable electrodes C25B9/12; assemblies of cells with electrodes made of particles C25B9/16

title-part.text: Manufacture thereof not otherwise provided for

CPC-specific-text.text: of electrodes having a substrate and a coating
characterised by the material of the substrate
consisting of one single element or compound
consisting of plurality elements or compounds
comprising metal powder and a non-metallic binder
characterised by the material of the coating
Coatings consisting of a single component
Coatings consisting of two or more components
comprising at least a noble metal or noble metal oxide and a non-noble metal oxide
at least one of the components being an organic compound
comprising two or more noble metals or noble metal alloys

title-part.text: Electrodes based on manganese dioxide or lead dioxide

reference.text: controlling or regulating in general G05

title-part.text: Detection or inhibition of short circuits in the cell
Supplying or removing reactants or electrolytes
